mapper.insert: insert into QUERYHISTORY (username,paperId, idx, content, who, totalCost, totalTokens, promptTokens, completionTokens) values (#{username}, #{paperid}, #{idx}, #{content}, #{who}, #{totalCost}, #{totalTokens},#{promptTokens}, #{completionTokens})
mapper.select: select content, who, id, score from QUERYHISTORY where paperId = #{paperIsd} and username= #{username} order by id ASC
select idx from QUERYHISTORY where paperId = #{paperId} and username= #{username} order by idx DESC LIMIT 1
select content, who, p.paperId, p.title from QUERYHISTORY as q INNER JOIN PAPER as p ON q.paperId = p.paperId where q.username= #{username} order by id DESC
select content, who, id, score from QUERYHISTORY where paperId = #{paperIsd} and username= #{username} order by idx ASC
